title: L'Oreal Paris Sublime Bronze Self Tanning Mist, Deep to Natural Spray Tan, 4.6 oz
features: L’Oreal Paris Sublime Bronze Self-Tanning Mist: Get a streak-free tan with this sunless tanning mist; With angled applicator for ultra-even application and natural-looking results — even on the areas that are hardest to reach
Salon-inspired self-tan at home: This self-tanner is streak-free, quick-drying and gives you salon-inspired airbrush tanning results at home; Even, smooth, sunless tan develops in 2-4 hours

L'Oreal Paris Self-Tanners: Our self tanners allow you to get a gorgeous, sun-kissed glow right at home; L'Oréal Paris sunless tanners are easy to apply and give your skin streak-free color, in lotions, mousses, towelettes, serums and mists
Sun-kissed look: No need to expose skin to potentially harmful UV rays to get a gorgeous sun-kissed look; Achieve the look of tanned skin at home with L'Oreal Paris Self-Tanning products

Pair it with: Try with Sublime Bronze Self-Tanning Towelettes, convenient plus easy to use towelettes for a streak-free, natural-looking tan; Individually wrapped towelettes make them perfect for use at home or on the go
description: For best results, apply to clean and exfoliated skin - Use daily until you have achieved your desired level of tan, then use 1-2 times per week to maintain your tan
